mapper.insert: insert into test_comment (c_num, mi_num, c_comment, m_num, c_point) values (seq_reply.nextval, #{mi_num}, #{c_comment}, (select m_num from test_member where m_id = #{m_id}), #{c_point})
mapper.update: update test_comment set c_comment = #{c_comment}, updatedate = sysdate, c_point=#{c_point} where c_num = #{c_num}
mapper.select: select count(c_num) from test_comment where mi_num = #{mi_num}
